eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.gtwrap.interfaces

Interface IPatternMatchContext


  • public interface IPatternMatchContext
    The context of a match. Can be obtained from IBlockWorldState.getMatchContext() or IBlockWorldState.getLayerContext().
    ZenClass:
    mods.gregtech.multiblock.IPatternMatchContext
